title: Ambient Video Game Music - Coastal Storm 2
description: Dive back into the tempest with the gripping sequel to our acclaimed collection of coast-themed ambience packs.
longDescription:
Dive back into the tempest with the gripping sequel to our acclaimed collection of coast-themed ambience packs. This set of 10 packs continues to deliver the mesmerizing power and raw beauty of a coastal storm, providing game developers with an enriched auditory canvas that amplifies the atmospheric tension of their games.


Each pack in this sequel heightens the storm experience with a more immersive soundscape. The rain pours with greater intensity, each droplet captured in high-definition audio to paint an even more vivid picture of a storm-ravaged coastline. The constant patter of rain, oscillating between gentle showers and raging torrents, creates an absorbing, dynamic backdrop.


Echoing the fury of the storm are the amplified sounds of waves crashing against the rocky shore. These packs capture every nuance of a tempest-tossed sea, from the raw power of each monstrous wave to the sizzling hiss of the sea foam. The amplified crashes and the resulting spray of water against the rocks amplify the visceral force of nature's wrath.


This sequel is a must-have for game developers looking to deepen their storm-laden coastal environments. The enhanced sounds of the rain and waves, coupled with the emotive track, promise to fully immerse players in a hyper-realistic, storm-swept coastal landscape. This collection further intensifies the auditory experience, allowing players to feel every raindrop and wave crash as if they were truly caught in the heart of the storm.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
